languages.text: "Виноват! Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость! Приказ..." {n}Втянув голову в плечи и с ужасом глядя на вас, страж поспешно ретируется. Похоже, ваш гнев пугает его куда больше, чем шанс столкнуться с новыми мятежниками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Виноват! Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость! Приказ..." {n}Втянув голову в плечи и с ужасом глядя на вас, страж поспешно ретируется. Похоже, ваш гнев пугает его куда больше, чем шанс столкнуться с новыми мятежниками.{/n}

languages.text: "The fault is mine! I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Orders are orders..." {n}He shrinks, looking at you in terror, and departs with haste. It seems your anger scares him far more than the prospect of running into more rebels.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Виноват! Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость! Приказ..." {n}Втянув голову в плечи и с ужасом глядя на вас, страж поспешно ретируется. Похоже, ваш гнев пугает его куда больше, чем шанс столкнуться с новыми мятежниками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me! I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Orders are orders..." {n}He shrinks, looking at you in terror, and departs with haste. It seems your anger scares him far more than the prospect of running into more rebels.{/n}

"Forgive me! I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Orders are orders..." {n}He shrinks, looking at you in terror, and departs with haste. It seems your anger scares him far more than the prospect of running into more rebels.{/n}

"The fault is mine! I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Orders are orders..." {n}He shrinks, looking at you in terror, and departs with haste. It seems your anger scares him far more than the prospect of running into more rebels.{/n}

"The fault is mine! I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Orders are orders..." {n}He shrinks, looking at you in terror, and departs with haste. It seems your anger scares him far more than the prospect of running into more rebels.{/n}

languages.text: "Es ist mein Fehler! Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Befehl ist Befehl ..." {n}Er schrumpft förmlich zusammen, blickt dich völlig verängstigt an, und verschwindet eilig. Dein Zorn scheint ihm sehr viel mehr Angst zu machen als die Vorstellung, noch mehr Rebellen zu begegnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The fault is mine! I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Orders are orders..." {n}He shrinks, looking at you in terror, and departs with haste. It seems your anger scares him far more than the prospect of running into more rebels.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es ist mein Fehler! Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Befehl ist Befehl ..." {n}Er schrumpft förmlich zusammen, blickt dich völlig verängstigt an, und verschwindet eilig. Dein Zorn scheint ihm sehr viel mehr Angst zu machen als die Vorstellung, noch mehr Rebellen zu begegnen.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est ma faute... Votre Seigneurie, je vous supplie de me pardonner ! Les ordres sont les ordres, voyez-vous... » {n}L'homme se ratatine à vue d'œil, vous regardant d'un air terrifié avant de filer avec hâte. Votre colère semble lui faire bien plus peur que l'idée de croiser d'autres rebelles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The fault is mine! I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Orders are orders..." {n}He shrinks, looking at you in terror, and departs with haste. It seems your anger scares him far more than the prospect of running into more rebels.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est ma faute... Votre Seigneurie, je vous supplie de me pardonner ! Les ordres sont les ordres, voyez-vous... » {n}L'homme se ratatine à vue d'œil, vous regardant d'un air terrifié avant de filer avec hâte. Votre colère semble lui faire bien plus peur que l'idée de croiser d'autres rebelles.{/n}

languages.text: “是我的错！请求您原谅，大人！但命令就是命令……”{n}他后退了几步，惊恐地看着你，然后匆匆离去。看来，你的怒火比随时可能出现的叛军更让他害怕。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The fault is mine! I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Orders are orders..." {n}He shrinks, looking at you in terror, and departs with haste. It seems your anger scares him far more than the prospect of running into more rebels.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是我的错！请求您原谅，大人！但命令就是命令……”{n}他后退了几步，惊恐地看着你，然后匆匆离去。看来，你的怒火比随时可能出现的叛军更让他害怕。{/n}

languages.text: 「僕の過失です！どうかお許しください、陛下！命令は命令なんです…」{n}青年は恐怖で縮み上がってあなたを見ると、大急ぎで離れていく。数多くの暴徒に出くわす可能性よりも、あなたの怒りの方が彼をはるかに震え上がらせるようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The fault is mine! I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Orders are orders..." {n}He shrinks, looking at you in terror, and departs with haste. It seems your anger scares him far more than the prospect of running into more rebels.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「僕の過失です！どうかお許しください、陛下！命令は命令なんです…」{n}青年は恐怖で縮み上がってあなたを見ると、大急ぎで離れていく。数多くの暴徒に出くわす可能性よりも、あなたの怒りの方が彼をはるかに震え上がらせるようだ。{/n}

languages.text: «¡La culpa es mía! ¡Le pido perdón, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Las órdenes son las órdenes...». {n}Se encoge, mirándote aterrorizado, y se marcha a toda prisa. Parece que tu ira le asusta mucho más que la posibilidad de encontrarse con más rebeldes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The fault is mine! I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Orders are orders..." {n}He shrinks, looking at you in terror, and departs with haste. It seems your anger scares him far more than the prospect of running into more rebels.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡La culpa es mía! ¡Le pido perdón, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Las órdenes son las órdenes...». {n}Se encoge, mirándote aterrorizado, y se marcha a toda prisa. Parece que tu ira le asusta mucho más que la posibilidad de encontrarse con más rebeldes.{/n}

languages.text: "Benim kabahatim! Affınıza sığınıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Emir işte." {n}Olduğu yerde büzülüyor, dehşet içinde sana bakıyor ve aceleyle ayrılıyor. Anlaşılan öfken, onu daha fazla isyancıyla karşılaşma ihtimalinden çok daha fazla korkuttu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The fault is mine! I beg your forgiveness, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Orders are orders..." {n}He shrinks, looking at you in terror, and departs with haste. It seems your anger scares him far more than the prospect of running into more rebels.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Benim kabahatim! Affınıza sığınıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Emir işte." {n}Olduğu yerde büzülüyor, dehşet içinde sana bakıyor ve aceleyle ayrılıyor. Anlaşılan öfken, onu daha fazla isyancıyla karşılaşma ihtimalinden çok daha fazla korkuttu.{/n}
